qas.question: How is Nanjing seen, from a cultural perspective?
Who provides strong support to Nanjing?
What city is considered one of the more pleasant cities to live in, by the Chinese?
Does Nanjing have a long or short tradition of culture?

context: Today, with <a3_0>a long cultural tradition<a3_0/> and strong support from <a1_0>local educational institutions<a1_0/>, <a2_0>Nanjing<a2_0/> is commonly viewed <a0_0>as a “city of culture”<a0_0/> and one of the more pleasant cities to live in China.
